title: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Educational Co-Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment centered on smartphone-based learning activities, where learners—professionals—require job-integrated curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete three social studies projects within six months using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can accurately apply a collaborative educational content co-design process with peers and instructors at over 80% fidelity.
Learners successfully complete the learning plan establishment-execution-evaluation cycle at least four times using mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
